content: Hello, Anirudh! How can I assist you today?
Hi , I wanted to know if a car travelled 50km in 1 hour , what is distance/time called?

The term for "distance/time" is **speed**. 

In this case, if a car traveled 50 km in 1 hour, the speed of the car is calculated as:
\[ \text{Speed} = \frac{\text{Distance}}{\text{Time}} \]

So, the car traveled at a speed of \(50 \, \text{km/h}\).
